_comment: Ground Truth Annotation Template for BeneAI Performance Testing - Coffee Shop Conversation
_instructions: 1. Copy this template and rename it to match your test video (e.g., coffee_shop_conversation_annotations.json)
2. Fill in the 'video' field with the filename of your test video
3. Set 'fps' to the original frame rate of your video (use 'ffmpeg -i video.mp4' to check)
4. Add annotations for each moment where emotions/states are clearly visible
5. Use timestamps in seconds (can be decimal, e.g., 2.5 for 2.5 seconds)
6. Emotion values should match Hume AI emotions or common emotions (see list below)
notes: Social interaction annotation for conversation between Johnny and Yaseen at coffee shop. Focus on Yaseen's facial expressions and engagement signals.

annotations.notes: Neutral baseline, scanning menu, relaxed posture, mouth closed, no tension around eyes
Brief glance, quick half-smile, eyebrows lift, eye contact maintained - positive micro-response
Lips pull slightly upward, head tilt toward Johnny, shoulders stay relaxed - interest detected
Amused micro-smile, slight brow raise, eye contact continues - humor landed
Neutral-to-positive, chin nod, engagement steady after mentioning lab
Quick inhale, looks up briefly as if recalling, then back - comfortable and preparing to explain
Slight eyebrow knit on 'debugging,' then relax - still engaged in technical discussion
Smile returns, micro-nods, stance opens a bit toward Johnny - connection made
Slight lip press on 'drift,' then relaxed - engagement sustained during technical explanation
Soft laugh, shoulders lift briefly - shared vibe, mutual rapport achieved
Glance to the seating area, then back - neutral-positive, considering options
Open posture, continued eye contact - green light for continued conversation
Animated hand gesture, enthusiasm increases when discussing project
Engaged; smile is consistent throughout project description
Affirmative nods, positive micro-smile - receptive to future collaboration
Steady smile, relaxed shoulders - agreement to exchange contact information
Amused smile, final nod - positive end state to conversation

_validation_notes: Ensure timestamps are in ascending order
Confidence scores should be 0.0-1.0 (1.0 = very confident in annotation)
Annotations placed at key emotional/engagement transitions every 6 seconds
Mark clear social engagement signals and emotional shifts
Use 'notes' field to document facial cues and body language that led to annotation
This template tracks a natural conversation progression from neutral → receptive → engaged → positive
